mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.openid AS "openid", a.subscribe AS "subscribe", a.subscribetime AS "subscribetime", a.nickname AS "nickname", a.sex AS "sex", a.country AS "country", a.province AS "province", a.city AS "city", a.language AS "language", a.headimgurl AS "headimgurl", a.user_name AS "username", a.tel AS "tel", a.address AS "address", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.last_login_time AS "lastLoginTime", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM weixin_user_info a
AND a.nickname LIKE '%'||#{nickname}||'%' '%'+#{nickname}+'%' concat('%',#{nickname},'%')
AND a.user_name LIKE '%'||#{username}||'%' '%'+#{username}+'%' concat('%',#{username},'%')
AND a.tel LIKE '%'||#{tel}||'%' '%'+#{tel}+'%' concat('%',#{tel},'%')
AND a.address LIKE '%'||#{address}||'%' '%'+#{address}+'%' concat('%',#{address},'%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC

SELECT
FROM weixin_user_info a
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO weixin_user_info( id, openid, subscribe, subscribetime, nickname, sex, country, province, city, language, headimgurl, user_name, tel, address, create_by, last_login_time, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{openid}, #{subscribe}, #{subscribetime}, #{nickname}, #{sex}, #{country}, #{province}, #{city}, #{language}, #{headimgurl}, #{username}, #{tel}, #{address}, #{createBy.id}, #{lastLoginTime}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks} )
mapper.update: UPDATE weixin_user_info SET openid = #{openid}, subscribe = #{subscribe}, subscribetime = #{subscribetime}, nickname = #{nickname}, sex = #{sex}, country = #{country}, province = #{province}, city = #{city}, language = #{language}, headimgurl = #{headimgurl}, user_name = #{username}, tel = #{tel}, address = #{address}, last_login_time = #{lastLoginTime}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
